Address.label: Address
Address.value: 200 BLOOR STREET EAST, TORONTO, Ontario, M4W 1E5, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Manulife provides life insurance and wealth management products and services to individuals and group customers in Canada, the United States, and Asia. Manulife is one of Canada's Big Three Life Insurance companies (the other two are Sun Life and Great West Life). As of Dec. 31, 2021, Manulife reported assets under management or administration of about CAD $1.4 trillion.
